message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit you. Given its high quality and unique features, I propose a price of $150 for it. I trust this investment will pay off in the long run, enhancing your experience and efficiency. Let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or if you have any questions.

I'm interested in the product, but I think $150 is a bit steep for my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $120? I believe this is a fair price considering the product's features and quality.
